channel.title: Which topic interests you the most and why
channel.description:
I have to write a paper about one of the following topics, which one would you pick and why?
* ERP * Software defined networks * Trends in IT infrastructure [b]* Containers (and Docker)[/b] * Big data analytics * iOS development [b]* Microservices architecture[/b] * The internet of things * We are makers (3d printing, iot, crowd sourcing, ..) * Hands-on mobile development * Ethical hacking
I'm doubting between the two topics in bold: Containers (and Docker) and Microservices architecture. Both of these seem useful in the near future.
I do like the internet of things and we are makers, but those seem tedious to write a paper about. Hands-on mobile development treats cross platform app development (web vs native vs xamarin vs ...?)

item.title: Which topic interests you the most and why
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Personally, ‘Ethical Hacking’ interests me the most, but only because it’s something I already have an interest in. What class is the paper for, I think it makes a difference - for example if I was writing an ‘Ethical Hacking’ paper the only interesting angle I can think of is a more sociological/perhaps business-impacty type angle, whereas if its supposed to be a techical paper the SOA or big data ones might be a better choice.

Read full topic

item.title: Which topic interests you the most and why
item.dc:creator: @Kattoor Snow_
item.description:
@Kattoor wrote:

[quote=“justaguy, post:5, topic:553901”][quote author=Snow_ link=topic=672823.msg4499240#msg4499240 date=1448062918]

big data

Yeah, I know big data has future, but I’m much more interested in software architecture… that’s why I was thinking about microservices…
[/quote]

Then why’d you put it there…[/quote]

Because I wasn’t fully sure! I also like to hear what you people think about these different technologies

[quote=“Travas, post:8, topic:553901”][quote author=Hyperon link=topic=672823.msg4499290#msg4499290 date=1448139729]
ethical hacking sounds interesting and philosophical.
[/quote]CEH draws a lot of peoples attention, and also is very hard to get into (and stay).

If I was going to write about one of those topics, this would be my first choice.[/quote]
Ethical Hacking also interests me a lot, but I don’t think I’ll be much with this when I’m searching for a job later (a non hacker job), or am I wrong?

Fat Cookies:

IoT

Also something that interests me, but isn’t it stupid to make a paper on it? Imo IoT is something to do, not to write a paper on, not?

Just so you guys know, I’m not just trying to shoot down your ideas, but I’d like to know more about what you think about it

Read full topic

item.title: Which topic interests you the most and why
item.dc:creator: @Kattoor Snow_
item.description:
@Kattoor wrote:

I have to write a paper about one of the following topics, which one would you pick and why?

  • ERP
  • Software defined networks
  • Trends in IT infrastructure
    * Containers (and Docker)
  • Big data analytics
  • iOS development
    * Microservices architecture
  • The internet of things
  • We are makers (3d printing, iot, crowd sourcing, …)
  • Hands-on mobile development
  • Ethical hacking

I’m doubting between the two topics in bold: Containers (and Docker) and Microservices architecture.
Both of these seem useful in the near future.

I do like the internet of things and we are makers, but those seem tedious to write a paper about.
Hands-on mobile development treats cross platform app development (web vs native vs xamarin vs …?)

Read full topic
